## R Markdown

This is an R Markdown document. 

```{r}
# trying to graph the number of total calls per species
bats <- readRDS('bats.RData')
bats <- bats %>% 
  mutate(year = year(DATE))

No.ID <- c('NoId', 'NoID', 'Noise')
  

bats.time <- bats %>% 
  filter(! AUTO.ID %in% No.ID) %>% 
  filter(year < 2022) %>% 
  group_by(year, AUTO.ID) %>%
  tally()

ggplot(data = bats.time, aes(x = year, y = n, color = AUTO.ID))+
  geom_line()+
  labs(title = 'Number of Total Calls Per Species', subtitle = "From 2017-2021", x = 'Year', y = 'Number of Calls')
```
